item.title: Creating My Coding Blog With Hugo
item.description:
Introduction Link to heading

When I started thinking about creating a website to showcase my coding journey, I had no experience with HTML, CSS, or JavaScript, so I thought it would be too big a challenge to start from scratch. On the other hand, I didnâ€™t want to have it all done for me with a website generator like Wix or GoDaddy because I wanted to gain some learning in web design from the experience.
